I'm Torunn Seim Skrogstad, a Norwegian designer, here to teach the masses about fuselages*.

I'm a UX/UI designer with 13 years experience in commercial design. I help startups and established companies nail down their user experiences, sell their products and look great in front of their competitors. I love a tight deadline, and I don't blow the budget. Sounds good? Let's Skype.

Lately I've been working mostly with conferences and SaaS apps, but I'm open for anything that's creative and innovative. Is that your business or product? I'd love to hear about it.

I love being social, and here's where to find me

  • Twitter
  • Dribbble
  • LinkedIn
  • Vimeo
  • Instagram

or email me at torunn@skrogstad.no

* What is this Fuselagetown stuff, you say?
Skrog = Fuselage
Stad = Town
Simples.
